author: chirino
msg: The Producer MemoryLimit can lead to network deadlock when spooling is disabled.
So we now disable using it when sooling is used on a queue.

author: dkulp
msg: Fix an issue with exceptions thrown from Providers not being put in a soap:env/soap:body

author: djd
msg: DERBY-2109 Another sub-set of code from the 12 patch in the issue.
Framework code in InternalDriver and sub-classes to check permissions.
Code to enforce engine shutdown permission in InternalDriver but commented out. Need to understand which test code in the patch may be affected.
